overview: Sophisticated and debonair, their hot bodies glisten in the California sun. They've got money, and they've got the looks. It takes a lot to fit in with these guys, but if you've got what it takes, you're in for some hardcore man fun on the west side of town. These boys can have what they want and take what they need. If it's you they want, then they'll have you: money, sex, and glamour in the world of the elite. Prestige and class will have you going down with the "Boys From Bel-Air."
title: Boys From Bel Air
